description: The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat requires the services of a Project Manager to support the Employee Relations and Total Compensation Benefit Plans procurement and retendering team.
full_summary:
# Project Management Benefit Plans
### Solicitation Summary

**Reference:** CB-7079-78721299

**Solicitation Number:** 24062-23-506

### Tender Status

This tender is expired.

### Tender Information

* **Publication Date:** July 10, 2023
* **Closing Date:** July 31, 2023 (14:00:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026

### Tender Description
The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat is soliciting for the services of a Level 3 Project Manager to support the Employee Relations & Total Compensation Benefit Plans Procurement and Retendering team in developing and delivering project management tasks. The successful bidder will be responsible for planning, organizing, and controlling projects to deliver the required outcomes.

### Tender Requirements

* **Solicitation Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** The tender is open to bidders who can provide goods and services in accordance with the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other agreements listed in the tender documents.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** The tender is open to bidders from the National Capital Region (NCR).
* **Regions of Delivery:** The services will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Tender Evaluation Criteria
The tenders will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Dawn Dormer
dawn.dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca
(343) 542-8102

### Tender Documents
The tender documents can be downloaded from the following URLs:
[English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7079/24062-23-506-npp-english.pdf)
[French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7079/24062-23-506-npp-french.pdf)
